mapper.select: select m.username, m.gender, m.birth, m.no, t.pic, t.care_type, t.child_age, t.activity_type, t.desired_wage, t.area1, t.headcount, t.discussion from teacher t join member m on t.userid= m.userid where who = 'T'
select username, birth, no, round((sysdate - last_edit) *1440) as last_edit from member
select userid from teacher where activity_type like '%실내놀이%'
